official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to the terminology used in notices to nonparticipating physicians providing services for which payment is denied.

summary.text: Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require that Medicare coverage denial notices provided to nonparticipating physicians and their patients include an explanation of such denial.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to the terminology used in notices to nonparticipating physicians providing services for which payment is denied.
